title: Anagram word finder
meta: Still thinking of unscrambling words and anagrams ? Use our anagram finder now!

featureList.feature_heading: Our Anagram solver and word finder  for your word games
featureList.feature_text: Take an ordinary word and rearrange the letters. That's an anagram. The anagram word finder compares these letters to all the possible words those letters of another could make.

featureList.feature_heading: Where to use this Anagram word finder?
featureList.feature_text: You can use this anagram solver for the Scrabble crossword game, facebook games like Wordscraper, Scrabulous, Lexulous and many other wrd games.
Take the word “painter” which on anagramming becomes, “repaint” by moving the suffix to the beginning. In the same way, the letters could be rearranged to make the word “pertain”.
We love to play Scrabble and understand all the fine details. We will find all valid words from dictionaries of your choice along with their scores.
